entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
